mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Loeser, Lucien to Pierpont, Francis Harrison
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Loeser, Lucien
mdRecord.dcterms:description: FH Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Gov Wheeling Dec 30 1861. By Telegraph from Buffalo Va 30 1861. When will you send us arms tis' dangerous to send parties out recruiting scouting without arms telegraph Lucien Loeser Col 8th Va 19W86&67coll
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Loeser, Lucien
Buffalo, Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis Harrison
